title: Services
quote: Vous devez soit modifier vos rêves ou améliorer vos compétences.
author: Jim Rohn
subtitle: Know yourself better to make the right career choices and prepare for professional integration
description: A team of professionals dedicated to helping you choose your study path and facilitating your professional integration.

orientation.title: ACADEMIC ADVISING
orientation.description: Our experts will help you identify and choose the study program(s) and careers best suited to your skills, goals and personality

thesis.title: PROOFREADING
thesis.description: Proofreading  of theses, essays, dissertations,  etc by senior linguists and editord  (English, French, German and Spanish.)

international.title: INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS
international.description: Assistance in: Application, Visa, Administrative procedures, Accommodation, etc.

professionals.title: MEET WITH EXPERTS
professionals.description: Discover job profiles through  professionals in these fields.

mentoring.title: MENTORING
mentoring.description: Whether as future employee or entrepreuneur, our experts will support you each step of the way (skill assessment, job search strategy, business plans, etc.).

germany.title: STUDY IN GERMANY
germany.description: Our experts trained in Germany will give you pratical advice on successfully applying and preparing for studies at German universities or vocational colleges.

contact: Contact us for more information or to make a special request.
